# Build the SQL Server Backup Command
backup_command <- paste0(
  "sqlcmd -S ", server,
  " -d ", database,
  " -E ", 
  " -Q \"BACKUP DATABASE [", database, "] TO DISK='", backup_file, "'\""
)

# Execute the backup command
system(backup_command)
